thread.title_full: Delectable photo of Mo Abudu and daughter ▷ NAIJ.COM

author: Seun Durojaiye
title: Delectable photo of Mo Abudu and daughter ▷ NAIJ.COM
text: Media Mogul, Mo Abudu and daughter showed up at a huge party looking like beautiful flowers Media mogul Mo Abudu Mosunmola Abudu popularly known as Mo Abudu is a TV producer, media personality, human resources management consultant, Nigerian talk show host, entrepreneur and a philanthropist. Mo is an extra-ordinary woman who has achieved a lot through out her life and career. Which comes as no surprise as she was listed by Forbes as the most successful African woman. Recently, the media proprietor was seen with her daughter, Ted, at the Elfike Collective costume party. The mother and daughter duo rocked simple dresses with flowery print designs all over. Mo Abudu and daughter
